faculty.address:
Tartu linn,

label.en: 24/25 S block mode part 4 3 CP HV

description.en:
LOG BUILDING PRACTICE. Reinforcing the material acquired during the courses Introductory course on log building and Log building course. 
The student keeps a practice diary during the work period according to the regulations provided by the Native Construction practice guidelines (https://www.is.ut.ee/pls/ois_sso/tere.tulemast?viit=2120006) and submits a proper written practice report on each stage of the practice.
description.et:
PALKEHITUSE PRAKTIKA
Harjutades kinnistatakse aine Palkehituse alused ja Palkehituse põhikursus materjal. Üliõpilane peab tööperioodil praktikapäevikut vastavalt RE praktikajuhendis (https://www.is.ut.ee/pls/ois_sso/tere.tulemast?viit=2120006) määratletud korrale ning esitab iga praktika järgu kohta korrakohase kirjaliku praktikaaruande.

objectives.en: Practice reinforces students' knowledge on log building technology and establishes experiential relationship to the field. After completing the practice the students have acquired adequate understanding of the productivity, material and work volumes and quality in handmade log building. They are morally and technically mature for practice placement in a professional log building team.
objectives.et: Praktikal kinnistab üliõpilane teadmised palkehitustehnikast ning loob valdkonnaga vahetu kogemusliku suhte. Praktika läbimise järel on üliõpilane omandanud adekvaatse ettekujutuse tootlikkusest, materjali- ja töömahtudest ning kvaliteedist käsitöises palkehituses ning on moraalselt ja tehniliselt küps praktikaks kutselises palkehitusebrigaadis.

grade_preconditions.et:
Praktikale pääsemise tingimuseks on Puidutehnoloogia aluste ja Palkehituse aluste ülesannete sooritamine hiljemalt praktika alguseks.

Praktikaülesannete sooritamine, osalemine praktikal vähemalt 80 % ulatuses, aruande esitamine tähtaegselt ja nõuetekohaselt. Töö praktikal osutab, et on omandatud palkide inventeerimise ja Chambersi metoodika põhjal järgmise palgi valimise metoodika.

The prerequisite for being admitted to practical training is the execution of the assignments of Introduction to Woodworking Technology and Introductory Course on Log Building the latest by the beginning of practical training.

The execution of practical training tasks, taking part in practical training in the scope of at least 80%, the presentation of the report in due time and as required. Work during practical training indicates that the student has acquired the method of log selection and the methodology for selecting the following log using the Chambers methodology.

debt_elimination.et:
Ülesannete esitamisega põhjendamatu hilinemise või praktikumidelt puudumise korral esitab üliõpilane vabalt valitud erialasel teemal referaadi mahuga vähemalt 4 lk kahe nädala jooksul pärast võlgnevuse tekkimist koos hilinenud ülesandega, kui ei ole kokku lepitud muud tähtaega ega muud viisi hilinemise korvamiseks. Hilinemisreferaadi või vastava ülesande järjekordsel esitamata jätmisel esitab üliõpilane järjekordselt 4 lk referaati jne jne. Hilinenud ülesande hindamisel on õppejõul õigus vähendada hinnet igakordselt palli võrra või kahekordsel hilinemisel üliõpilane kursuselt eemaldada (tulemus: mitteilmunud).

Praktikalt terve päeva võrra põhjendamatu ja ette kokku leppimata puudumise korral või korduva riskiohtliku käitumise korral on juhendajal õigus praktikant praktikalt eemaldada.

In case of an unjustified delay in submitting assignments or in case of being absent from practical training the student will submit, within two weeks from the occurrence of such event, a term paper on his/her choice of speciality-related topic that is at least 4 pages long with the delayed assignment, unless some other deadline or some other way of compensating for the delay has been agreed upon. If such term paper or respective assignment is not submitted either, the student will submit an additional 4-page term paper and so on and so on. In case of a delayed assignment the lecturer is entitled to diminish the grade by one level each time and in case of a two-time delay the teacher has the right to disqualify the student from the course (the result: failed to be present).
In case of an unjustified and previously not agreed upon day-long absence from practical training or in case of repeated risk-prone behaviour the lecturer has the right to disqualify the student from the course.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.et:
Loengud

1.	Kodutöö 1: Isiklik praktikakava. Häälestumine praktika sissejuhatavaks seminariks. 

III erialanädal
2.	Tutvumine praktikakoha- ja -ülesannetega. Instrueerimine. Töökoha ettevalmistamine.
3.	Tegelik mootorsaeõpetus: käivitamine, tankimine, teritamine ja hooldus. Küttesegud ja nende valmistamine, määrdeained. 
4.	Tegelik mootorsaeõpetus.
5.	Töökoha ettevalmistamine mootorsaega töötamiseks. Lühiülevaade langetamisest. Palkehitusspetsiifilised mootorsaetehnikad ja lõiked. Mootorsae lisaseadmed palkehituses. 
6.	Palkehitusspetsiifilised mootorsaetehnikad ja lõiked. Praktikanädala lõpetamine, koristus- ja korrastustööd, ettevalmistused tulevaks nädalaks. Nädala kokkuvõte.

IV erialanädal
7.	Palkehitusharjutused.
8.	Palkehitusharjutused.
9.	Palkehitusharjutused.
10.	Palkehitusharjutused.
11.	Praktika lõpetamine, koristus- ja korrastustööd, töövahendite hooldus, inventeerimine ja ladustamine. Kokkuvõte.

12.	Praktikaaruande koostamine, esitamine (paberkandjal osakonda ja elektroonilliselt moodle-keskkonna arhiivi). 

13.	Praktika tagasisideseminar.

1.	Home assignment 1: Personal practical training programme. Tuning in to the introductory seminar of the practical training.

Week III of specialisation
2.	Introduction to the practical training site and tasks. Instructions. Preparation of the place of work.
3.	Actual chain saw training: starting, filling, sharpening and maintenance. Fuel mixtures and their preparation, lubricants.
4.	Actual chain saw training.
5.	Preparing the work environment for working with a chain saw. Short overview of felling. Log building-specific chain saw techniques and cuts. Chain saw accessories for log building.
6.	Log building-specific chain saw techniques and cuts. Conclusion of the week of practical training, cleaning up and sorting out, preparations for the following week. A summary of the week.

Week IV of specialisation
7.	Log building exercises.
8.	Log building exercises.
9.	Log building exercises.
10.	Log building exercises.
11.	Conclusion of practical training, cleaning up and sorting out, maintenance of tools, inventory and storage. Summary.

12.	The drafting of practical training report, the submission of the report (on paper and electronically to the Moodle environment archive).
13.	Feedback seminar of practical training.
